metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19648 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the macho_parse_file functionality in macho/macho.c of YARA 3.11.0, command_size may be inconsistent with the real size. A specially crafted MachO file can cause an out-of-bounds memory access, resulting in Denial of Service (application crash) or potential code execution.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Whilst the description claims code-execution, this is only an out-of-bounds read so just a denial of service.

criterions.comment: yara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
